example: He spends his time reading books.
exampleTranslate: Dia menghabiskan waktunya dengan membaca buku.

example: I like listening to music while studying.
exampleTranslate: Saya suka mendengar musik sambil belajar.

example: We are watching movies at the cinema.
exampleTranslate: Kami sedang menonton film di bioskop.

example: They are playing football in the field.
exampleTranslate: Mereka sedang bermain bola di lapangan.

example: She has a talent for drawing portraits.
exampleTranslate: Dia memiliki bakat untuk menggambar potret.

example: My mother loves cooking Italian food.
exampleTranslate: Ibu saya sangat suka memasak makanan Italia.

example: Traveling to new places is exciting.
exampleTranslate: Jalan-jalan ke tempat baru sangat menyenangkan.

example: He is playing game on his computer.
exampleTranslate: Dia sedang bermain game di komputernya.
